name: Mountain Oil Tanker: Heavy Tru
description:
Mountain Oil Tanker: Heavy Truck 2 is a driving simulation game for you & objective of this game is to drive from oil refinery to picking up fuel and delivering oil to the offroad petrol & diesel gas stations.

Features:
Challenges to enjoy Base Missions.
Excellent sound effects
Amazing 3D graphics
Different camera angles t
Amazing Gameplay with HD Graphics
